__e: But if Norman Bates is crazy, there are a whole lot of people around here runnin' him a close second.
I think he got himself a hot lead as to where your sister was going, probably from Norman Bates, and called you to keep you still while he took off after her and the money.
I mean, I'm sure Norman Bates was nice, at least when it came to his mother.
Norman, you cannot just walk away from school and leave.
Norman, you need to tell me what happened that night.
Norman, you wouldn't be doing this because you're mad at me, would you?
Norman, is what he just said true?
Norman is nice... okay, he's kind, he's a good person... but he just... he has another side to him.

Norman, it's so sweet of you.
Oh, Norman, I can't believe it.
I don't believe Norman did what you said.
I'll let you get back to your linen. - And the raking.

No, Norman, I don't think anything is different or ever will be.
